channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MD
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MD

item.title: Report X-2023120688
item.description:
Report X-2023120688

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-08T00:36:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-11
  • City: HALETHORPE
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: once noticed that the package was leaking, placed into a hazmat storage container and placed into the damage hazmat cage. DescribePack: one of the gallons had a loose cap. which caused the leakage. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: immediately cleaned up with powder to contain the smell that it gave off.

item.title: Report X-2023120731
item.description:
Report X-2023120731

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-05T18:16:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-12
  • City: HAGERSTOWN
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: THE PACKAGE WAS FOUND LEAKING DURING SORTATION. DescribePack: THE CAP CAME LOOSE AND THE PACKAGE WAS ON ITS SIDE CAUSING THE CONTENTS TO LEAK OUT INTERNALLY AND COAT THE OTHER JUGS IN THE PACKAGE. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: THE PACKAGE WAS PLACED IN A LINED TOTE FOR PROCESSING.

item.title: Report X-2023120662
item.description:
Report X-2023120662

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-09
  • City: BELTSVILLE
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: I found wet package in damage hazmat cage. I repacked it in a salvage drum and submited the required reports. DescribePack: About 1 cub of content spilled because of loose cap on container. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The damage package was placed in a tub and taken to the damage hazmat cage.

item.title: Report X-2023120572
item.description:
Report X-2023120572

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-02T15:11:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-02
  • City: LAUREL
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER CALLED TO PINK BELT FOR A LEAKING PACKAGE WITH A CORROSIVE LABEL. RESPONDED WITH FULL PPE, DECISION TREE AND RESPONSE SHEET. LEAKAGE CONFINED TO PACKAGE. RESPONDER CONTAINED PACKAGE IN SPILL TRAY AND RETURNED TO DMP FOR PROCESSING.

  • Description: RESPONDER CALLED TO SORT AISLE FOR LEAKING HAZMAT. RESPONDER INFORMED PACKAGE HAD A CORROSIVE LABEL. RESPONDED WITHFULL PPE, DECISION TREE AND RESPONSE SHEET. LEAKAGE CONFINED TO PACKAGE, NO FURTHER LEAKAGE. RESPONDER CONTAINED PACKAGE IN SPILL TRAY AND RETURNED TO DMP FOR PROCESSING.
